prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body portrait of a young man standing center, pure white background, no text / no symbols / no garbled characters / no words, in the style of Rococo oil painting, ornate and delicate, highly decorative.

A man of breathtaking beauty and sharp intellect, embodying the classical fantasy setting. His face is a masterpiece of symmetry and refined elegance, with a pale, flawless complexion. He has high, defined cheekbones, a straight, aristocratic nose, and a strong jawline softened by youth. His eyes are a piercing, intelligent silver-grey, almond-shaped and set under perfectly arched brows, conveying intense focus and analytical depth. His lips are finely shaped, set in a neutral, contemplative expression. His hair is a cascade of soft, platinum-blonde waves, styled in a sophisticated manner reminiscent of 18th-century aristocracy, with delicate curls framing his face and tied back with a simple black silk ribbon.

He wears an opulent, dark blue velvet frock coat embroidered with intricate silver thread in sunburst and geometric puzzle-like patterns, reflecting the game's themes of sun worship and logic. The coat is tailored to fit his athletic, well-proportioned frame, with a high collar and silver buttons. Beneath it is a cream-colored silk waistcoat and a white lace cravat. His breeches are tight-fitting black silk, tucked into polished black leather boots that rise to his knees. On his hands, he wears fine, fitted black leather gloves, hinting at his "Truth-Seer" ability which requires touch. His posture is upright and poised, exuding natural charm and a quiet, commanding presence that blends royal grace with a detective's keen observation. The overall aesthetic is one of华丽精致 (huá lì jīng zhì)洛可可风格 (Luòkěkě fēnggé), with attention to luxurious fabrics, delicate details, and a color palette of deep blue, silver, cream, and black., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
